caption.p: Range changes based on Maxent models for 30 North American bumblebee species between baseline (1960–1990) and future climate projections (RCP2.6 and RCP8.5) in 2050 and 2070, assuming ( a) unlimited dispersal, ( b) high dispersal (10 km/year), or ( c) negligible dispersal ability (0 km/year). Results were ordered by range change (%) under the RCP8.5 scenario in year 2070.
